issue.title: [Python] Make SubTreeFileSystem print method more informative
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11238](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11238). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The `SubTreeFileSystem` class does not have a `\_\_str\_\_` or `\_\_repr\_\_` method. Define these methods to show useful information when these objects are printed, such as a filesystem URI including scheme.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11238?focusedCommentId=17432261) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11447
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11447>
